== WartyWarthog Mail Policy ==

* By default, the MTA should be configured for local delivery only, no questions asked
* Mail for all system users should be directed to the first user added to the system
* The standard MUA should provide access to the user's spool mailbox, or incorporate its contents, so that the user actually receives mail from system processes
* The user should not receive mail from system processes unless it is important
